org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.couchdb.dialect.backend.facade.impl

Interface DatabaseClient


  • @Path(value="/")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public interface DatabaseClient
    The Interface used by RESTEasy to create the REST calls used to interact with the CouchDB database instance. The methods return a Response instance in order to have more information in case of failures.
    Author:
    Andrea Boriero <dreborier@gmail.com>

    • Method Detail

      • saveDocument

        @PUT
 @Path(value="{id}")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response saveDocument(Document document,
                                                                 @PathParam(value="id")
                                                                 String id)
        Save a Document with the given id
        Parameters:
        document - to be saved
        id - to use for the document
        Returns:
        the Response from CouchDB

      • deleteDocument

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="{id}")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteDocument(@PathParam(value="id")

                                                                      @QueryParam(value="rev")
                                                                      String revision)
        Delete the CouchDBDocument with the given id and revision
        Parameters:
        id - of the CouchDBDocument to delete
        revision - of the CouchDBDocument to delete
        Returns:
        the Response

      • getEntityTuplesByTableName

        @GET
 @Path(value="_design/tuples/_view/tuplesByTableName")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response getEntityTuplesByTableName(@QueryParam(value="key")
                                                                                                                 String tableName)
        Retrieve all the entity tuples with the table name equals to the given one.
        Parameters:
        tableName - name of the entity
        Returns:
        the Response with the EntityTupleRows

      • getCurrentRevision

        @HEAD
 @Path(value="{id}")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response getCurrentRevision(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                        String id)
        Retrieves the current revision of the document with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the document of which to get the current revision
        Returns:
        the current revision of the specified document, contained in the response's ETag. If the specified document doesn't exist, the response's status will be 404.

      • getCurrentRevisionOfDesignDocument

        @HEAD
 @Path(value="_design/{id}")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response getCurrentRevisionOfDesignDocument(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                String id)
        Retrieves the current revision of the design document with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the design document of which to get the current revision
        Returns:
        the current revision of the specified design document, contained in the response's ETag. If the specified design document doesn't exist, the response's status will be 404.
